channel.title: Release on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Release on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: CodeQL adds Go 1.26 and Kotlin 2.3.10 support and improves query accuracy
item.description:
CodeQL 2.24.2 adds support for Go 1.26 and Kotlin 2.3.10, and includes query accuracy improvements.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Desktop 3.5.5 adds Git hooks support
item.description:
GitHub Desktop 3.5.5 adds support for Git hooks to address prior compatibility issues, especially with version managers and environment-dependent scripts.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: AKS support for Kubernetes version 1.34
item.description:
AKS now generally supports Kubernetes v1.34. The upstream v1.34 release includes 58 enhancements across feature maturity levels.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: dotnet: GitHub Copilot Testing for .NET Brings AI-powered Unit Tests to Visual Studio 2026
item.description:
GitHub Copilot Testing for .NET is generally available in Visual Studio 18.3, adding an AI-assisted workflow to generate and iterate on unit tests directly in the IDE.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: github: CodeQL 2.24.0 adds Swift 6.2 and .NET 10 support, and improves file handling for minified JavaScript
item.description:
CodeQL 2.24.0 is a new release of the static analysis engine used by GitHub code scanning. This update adds support for Swift 6.2, compatibility with .NET 10, and improves file handling for minified JavaScript to help detection and analysis of issues in those languages.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub MCP Server: New Projects tools, OAuth scope filtering, and new features
item.description:
GitHub released the MCP Server, adding improved management for GitHub Projects with more efficient use of the context window, automatic filtering of tools based on a token’s OAuth scopes/permissions, and additional new features and Projects-focused tools.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GPT-5.2-Codex is now available in Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse
item.description:
GitHub announced that GPT-5.2-Codex is generally available for Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+, and is now accessible in GitHub Copilot Chat on the web and mobile as well as integrated into Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: CodeQL 2.23.9 has been released
item.description:
GitHub announced the release of CodeQL 2.23.9, an update to the static analysis engine used by GitHub code scanning. The release notes indicate there are no user-facing changes; the announcement appeared on the GitHub Blog (2026-01-20).

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GPT-5.2-Codex is now generally available in GitHub Copilot
item.description:
GitHub announced that GPT-5.2-Codex is now generally available in GitHub Copilot and can be selected from the Copilot model picker for eligible plans.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GPT-5.2 is now generally available in GitHub Copilot
item.description:
GitHub announced that GPT-5.2 is now generally available in GitHub Copilot (Dec 17, 2025). The model is available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+ customers and can be used in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com and GitHub Mobile.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max is now generally available in GitHub Copilot
item.description:
GitHub has made the GPT-5.1-Codex-Max model generally available in GitHub Copilot for Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+. The model can be used in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com and GitHub Mobile.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.1-Codex are now generally available in GitHub Copilot
item.description:
GitHub announced that GPT-5.1 and GPT-5.1-Codex are now generally available for Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+, and can be accessed in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Gemini 3 Flash is now in public preview for GitHub Copilot
item.description:
GitHub announced that Gemini 3 Flash, a speed-focused variant of Gemini 3 suited for tasks where low latency matters, is rolling out in public preview for GitHub Copilot.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Enterprise Server 3.19 is now generally available
item.description:
GitHub Enterprise Server (GHES) 3.19 is now generally available. The release focuses on improving deployment efficiency, expanding monitoring capabilities, strengthening code security, and refining policy management with a more intuitive flow.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: CodeQL 2.23.6 adds Swift 6.2.1 and new C# security queries
item.description:
CodeQL 2.23.6 has been released, adding support for Swift 6.2.1 and introducing new C# security queries. CodeQL is the static analysis engine behind GitHub code scanning, used to find and remediate security issues. The announcement appeared on The GitHub Blog.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: CodeQL 2.23.5 adds support for Swift 6.2, new Java queries, and improved analysis accuracy
item.description:
GitHub released CodeQL 2.23.5, the static analysis engine used by GitHub code scanning. This update adds support for Swift 6.2, introduces three new Java security queries, and improves analysis accuracy.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Application Gateway mTLS passthrough support
item.description:
Azure Application Gateway now generally supports mTLS passthrough, enabling backend applications to receive client certificates and authorization headers for their own validation while still using the Web Application Firewall for traffic inspection.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Fuzzy search in Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL full-text search
item.description:
Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL now generally supports fuzzy search in its built-in full-text search, enabling typo-tolerant and error-resilient search experiences so users can find relevant results even when queries contain mistakes.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Visual Studio 2026
item.description:
Microsoft announced Visual Studio 2026 is generally available. The release modernizes the IDE with deep AI integration, including built-in GitHub Copilot and support for agentic workflows, to help professional developers work more productively.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: .NET 10
item.description:
Microsoft announced .NET 10 is generally available, delivering a faster, more secure, and more capable platform for modern development. The release improves performance, productivity, and security across the stack, and C# 14 adds language refinements for more natural, expressive coding.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: dotnet: Announcing .NET 10
item.description:
Microsoft announced .NET 10, describing it as the most productive, modern, secure, intelligent, and performant release to date, with platform-wide updates and new features across areas like ASP.NET Core, C# 14, .NET MAUI, and Aspire.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: github: Raptor mini is rolling out in public preview for GitHub Copilot
item.description:
GitHub has begun a public preview rollout of Raptor mini, an experimental model available in GitHub Copilot for Visual Studio Code. The model is being made available to users on Pro, Pro+, and Free plans and can be selected within the Copilot settings. The announcement appeared on the GitHub Blog.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: New releases for GitHub Actions â€“ November 2025
item.description:
GitHub increased limits for reusable workflows in GitHub Actions (November 2025): workflows can now nest up to 10 reusable workflows and a single workflow run can call up to 50 workflows in total.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generaly Available: Azure Sphere OS version 25.10 is now available for evaluation
item.description:
Azure Sphere OS version 25.10 is now available in the Retail Eval feed for a limited 14-day evaluation period. Customers and developers should use this window to confirm that their devices and applications function correctly with the new OS release before wider deployment.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: CodeQL 2.23.3 adds a new Rust query, Rust support, and easier C/C++ scanning
item.description:
CodeQL 2.23.3 is a maintenance release for GitHub’s static analysis engine that adds a new Rust query, improves Rust support, and makes C/C++ scanning easier, helping GitHub code scanning find and remediate security issues more effectively.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Claude Haiku 4.5 is generally available in all supported IDEs
item.description:
Claude Haiku 4.5 is now generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+ users and can be used in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com and in all supported IDEs.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Actions Runner Controller release 0.13.0
item.description:
Actions Runner Controller (ARC) 0.13.0 is released with updates that improve storage, networking, platform compatibility, and metrics. The release adds support for container lifecycle hooks to remove previous storage limitations.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Anthropicâ€™s Claude Haiku 4.5 is in public preview for GitHub Copilot
item.description:
Anthropicâ€™s Claude Haiku 4.5 â€” a newer, higher-performance and faster model â€” is rolling out in GitHub Copilot and is now available in public preview.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Enterprise Server 3.18 is now generally available
item.description:
GitHub Enterprise Server (GHES) 3.18 is now generally available. The release focuses on improving deployment efficiency, monitoring, code security, and policy management, and introduces the ability for enterprise administrators to define custom properties.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Latest PostgreSQL minor versions supported by Azure Database for PostgreSQL â€“ Flexible Server
item.description:
Azure Database for PostgreSQL â€“ Flexible Server now generally supports PostgreSQL minor versions 17.6, 16.10, 15.14, 14.19, 13.22 and 18 Beta 3; minor-version upgrades are applied automatically during monthly planned maintenance.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Spark: ðŸš€ Expanded access, enhanced reliability, and faster iteration history
item.description:
GitHub announced Spark is available in Public Preview for Copilot Enterprise customers, including Enterprise Managed Users (EMU) CE. Organization admins can enable Spark to provide access; the release emphasizes expanded access, improved reliability, and faster iteration history.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Anthropic Claude Sonnet 4.5 is in public preview for GitHub Copilot
item.description:
Anthropic’s Claude Sonnet 4.5, described as their most advanced model for coding and realâ€‘world agents, is rolling out in public preview inside GitHub Copilot and is available to Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise customers.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: CodeQL 2.23.1 adds support for Java 25, TypeScript 5.9 and Swift 6.1.3
item.description:
CodeQL 2.23.1 is a new release of GitHub’s static analysis engine that adds language support for Java 25, TypeScript 5.9, and Swift 6.1.3 to improve code scanning and security analysis.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Copilot coding agent is now generally available
item.description:
GitHub announced that the Copilot coding agent â€” an asynchronous, autonomous developer agent â€” is now generally available to all paid Copilot subscribers. Users can delegate tasks to the agent and it will act on their behalf, for example by opening draft pull requests.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: dotnet: .NET STS releases supported for 24 months
item.description:
Microsoft announced on the .NET Blog that .NET STS (short-term support) releases will be supported for 24 months.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: github: GitHub Mobile now supports iOS 26 with refined visuals and smoother navigation
item.description:
GitHub Mobile now supports iOS 26, bringing a refined visual language, smoother motion, and tighter system integration to make navigating and creating pull requests feel more natural.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Copilot in VS Code August release (v1.104)
item.description:
The August 2025 update (v1.104) for GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio Code delivers improvements aimed at greater flexibility, security, and productivity in AI-powered development workflows, and includes auto model selection in Copilot Chat.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Multiple assignees for issues and pull requests now available in all repositories
item.description:
GitHub announced that issues and pull requests can now have multiple assignees, and the feature is available across all public and private repositories.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Database for MySQL 8.4
item.description:
Azure Database for MySQL â€“ Flexible Server version 8.4 is now generally available, allowing creation of new production MySQL 8.4 servers with the latest features and performance improvements.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Copilot code review: Independent repository rule for automatic reviews
item.description:
GitHub announced a new standalone repository rule that lets you enable automatic Copilot code reviews independently; the feature is now generally available to Copilot users.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: CodeQL 2.23.0 adds support for Rust log injection and other security detection improvements
item.description:
CodeQL 2.23.0 is a new release of GitHub’s static analysis engine used by code scanning. The release adds explicit support for detecting Rust log injection and includes other security detection improvements to help find and remediate vulnerabilities.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: OpenAI GPT-5 and GPT-5 mini are now generally available in GitHub Copilot
item.description:
GitHub announced that OpenAIâ€™s GPT-5 and GPT-5 mini are now generally available in GitHub Copilot. The announcement explicitly states GPT-5 mini is available to all Copilot plans, including Copilot Free; the excerpt does not include full details about GPT-5 plan availability.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: CodeQL 2.22.4 adds support for Go 1.25 and accuracy improvements
item.description:
GitHub released CodeQL 2.22.4 (2025-09-02), adding support for Go 1.25 and delivering accuracy improvements to its static analysis engine used by GitHub Code Scanning to find and remediate security issues.

  • Source: GitHub
